tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterUsageReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    performance VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE reports_on_water_usage (
  report_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  water_usage FLOAT,
  efficiency FLOAT,
  system_performance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_system (
  system_id INT,
  system_name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  no_of_sensors INT,
  sensor_types JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    moisture_level INT,
    temperature FLOAT
);
